VenderInfo.Name: Cypress
VenderInfo.Description: The EZ-PD CCGx device family provides a complete solution for passive Electronically Marked Cable Assembly (EMCA) cables, active EMCA cables, USB Type-C Notebooks, Power Adapters, Monitors, Docks and Cable Adapters (dongles). The CCGx Host Software Development Kit (SDK) provides a USB-PD and Type-C specification compliant firmware stack and reference firmware that implements PD port controller applications for Notebook or Mobile platforms using each of the CCGx devices. The SDK includes firmware libraries and reference application sources, documentation and configuration/firmware upgrade tools.

Package.Name: EZ-PD CCGx Host SDK
Package.Description: The EZ-PD CCGx Host SDK includes firmware libraries, code examples, user guides and configuration utility to enable users to make use of EZ-PDâ„¢ CCGx PD Controller in Notebook designs.
